mean_en: a movement or sound that you make to give somebody information, instructions, a warning, etc.; a series of electrical waves that carry sounds, pictures or messages, for example to a radio, television or mobile/cell phone; a piece of equipment that uses different coloured lights to tell drivers to go slower, stop, etc., used especially on railways/railroads and roads
sentence: The ship sent out a signal for help.
sentence_trans: 这艘船发出了求救信号。
word_etyma: sign标志 + al名词/形容词后缀 → signal信号/显要的
